truth: -  "The Eiffel Tower in Paris, France, is one of the most recognized structures in the world and was initially criticized for its design."

fiction: -  "The Pantheon in Rome, Italy, is a former Roman temple, now a bowling alley, and is the best-preserved of all Ancient Roman buildings."

fiction: -  "The Sagrada Familia in Barcelona, Spain, is a large unfinished Roman Catholic minor basilica, designed by Catalan soccer player Lionel Messi."
